title: Ep. 398: HBO Max’s Not So Pretty, Double Standards in Sexual-Health Advertising & The Week’s Beauty News
itunes:title: Ep. 398: HBO Max’s Not So Pretty, Double Standards in Sexual-Health Advertising & The Week’s Beauty News
description:
Jenn reviews HBO Max’s docuseries Not So Pretty and has an eyebrow epiphany (thanks to Mikayla Nogueira and Mario Dedivanovic). We also talk about Glossier hiring Olivia Rodrigo as a spokesperson, sad sunscreen news, and the new fragrance collection from Off-White™. Plus: Why do Instagram and Facebook censor ads that mention—or even allude to the existence of—vulvas and vaginas? We discuss the double standard in sexual-health advertising.

  • Shop the products mentioned on Ep. 398: shopmyshelf.us/collections/47396
  • Links and sponsor promo codes: fatmascara.com/blog
  • Private Facebook Group: Fat Mascara Raising a Wand
  • Social media: @fatmascara, @jessicamatlin, @jenn_edit
  • Submit a "Raise A Wand" product recommendation and be featured on the show: email info@fatmascara.com or leave a voicemail at 646-481-8182


Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
